item.description: Hi, my name is Shiqi Ye. I’m a third-year Joint Ph.D. student between the Chow Institute, Xiamen University and the Academy of Mathematics and Systems Science, Chinese Academy of Sciences. I am grateful to be advised by Prof. Tingguo Zheng, Prof. Yongmiao Hong, and Prof. Ming Lin. My research areas include econometrics, financial econometrics, climate economics, regional economics, energy economics, and the Chinese economy. My current research is mainly focused on:

Education P.h.D. Econometrices, Chow Institue, 2024 (expected). M.A. Applied Economics and Econometrices, University of Southern California, 2020. B.A. Mathematics and Applied Mathematics, University of Science and Technology of China, 2018. Experiences Academy of Mathematics and Systems Science at Chinese Academy of Sciences joint Ph.D. student, 2022.09-2023.09. Fundamental Scientific Center for Economic Modeling and Economic Policy Studies research assistent, 2022.03-now. Projects ‚ÄúDual Carbon‚Äù Goal, Transition Risk, and Industry Connectedness ‚Äî Analysis Based on High-Dimensional Time-Frequency Complex Network
